definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: perh. entwine, enwrap (poss. denom., so MV al.; yet cf. NH [[חוֹתָל]] woven date-basket)—

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Inf. abs. [[הָחְתֵּל]] be swathed, swaddled;—[[וְהָמְלֵחַ]] [[לאׁ הֻמְלַ֫חַתְּ וְהָחְתֵּל לאׁ חֻתַּלְתְּ]] Ez Eze 16:4 and not at all wast thou rubbed with salt, and not at all wast thou swaddled, of Jerusalem under fig. of infant.
